title: Add lifecycle mapping validation + noise guards for analytics inputs

sections.text: Implement a validation step in the CRM ingestion/normalization pipeline that detects unmapped or ambiguously mapped stages/fields per connected CRM instance (including custom stage names and missing required fields). When validation fails, tag affected records with a mapping_error reason and exclude them from lifecycle-based analytics/forecasting aggregates to prevent noisy metrics. Emit structured logs/metrics (per instance, per field/stage) so sales ops can identify the specific mappings causing drift.
